message:
SYSTEM: PROLEGintro_eng_long.pdf: Página 28
Introduction: JUF Theory(continued)
• When I learned this theory, it surprised me very much that judges
made such a rigorous framework without knowing mathematical
formalizations.
• We propose a representation of legal knowledge which is more
friendly of JUF theory to lawyers than a logic program and simul-
taneously executable by a meta-interpreter written in PROLOG.
28
speaker: SYSTEM
